extremezone isnt a ripper, he just uploads torrents from his own collection or private sites in exchange for his bandwith. Neither does he crack games. All of the appropriate credits are in the torrents name. He just chooses the one he thinks is good. "Yify" is an account which uploads specifically from a scene group of multiple people under that name. Theres actually no similarity between the two.
